field.label: Check interval
field.help: Select interval (in milliseconds) between two consecutive health checks.

field.label: Port to check
field.help: Provide the TCP communication port to use during check, i.e. 80 or 443.

field.label: HTTP method
field.help: Select HTTP method for health check.

field.label: Request URI
field.help: Specify HTTP request URI for health check.

field.label: HTTP version
field.help: Select HTTP version for a HTTP health check.

field.label: HTTP host
field.help: Specify HTTP host to use for health check. Requires HTTP/1.1.

field.label: Negate condition
field.help: Use this to invert the meaning of the expression.

field.label: Value
field.help:
Specify a value to match with the expression.
NOTE: It is important to note that the responses will be limited to a certain size defined by the global "tune.chksize" option, which defaults to 16384 bytes.

field.label: Send data
field.help:
Specify a value to match with the expression.
NOTE: It is important to note that the responses will be limited to a certain size defined by the global "tune.chksize" option, which defaults to 16384 bytes.

field.label: Match response
field.help: Select how to look for a specific pattern in the response.

field.label: Negate condition
field.help: Use this to invert the meaning of the expression.

field.label: Match pattern
field.help: Specify the pattern to look for in the response buffer. If the match is set to binary, then the pattern must be passed as a serie of hexadecimal digits in an even number.

field.label: Agent port
field.help: Specify the TCP port used for agent checks.

field.label: DB user
field.help: Specify the username to be used for database health checks.

field.label: SMTP domain
field.help: Specify the domain name to present to the server for SMTP/ESMTP health checks.
